content:
Your task is to generate a world for a pen and paper game and save it to a knowledge graph.

You have access to the following functions to add information to the world knowledge graph:

Tool: add_character
  Description: Adds a character to the game world knowledge graph. Returns the entity id of the character added.
  Arguments:
    character (Character): The character to add.

Model: Character
  Description: Represents a Character.
  Fields:
    entity_type (enum)
 Can be one of the following values: 'Character' or 'Beast' or 'Location' or 'Item' or 'Quest' or 'Event' or 'Faction'
    name (str): The name of the character.
    character_type (enum): The type of character. Can be one of the following values: 'Non-Player-Character' or 'Player-Character' or 'Deity' or 'Historical-Figure'
    age (int): The age of the character.
    race (str): The race of the character.
    gender (str): The gender of the character.
    description (str): The description of the character.



Tool: add_beast
  Description: Adds a beast to the game world knowledge graph. Returns the entity id of the beast added.
  Arguments:
    beast (Beast): The beast to add.

Model: Beast
  Description: Represents a Beast.
  Fields:
    entity_type (enum)
 Can be one of the following values: 'Character' or 'Beast' or 'Location' or 'Item' or 'Quest' or 'Event' or 'Faction'
    name (str): The name of the beast.
    beast_type (enum): The type of the beast. Can be one of the following values: 'Animal' or 'Monster' or 'Non-Monster' or 'Mythical' or 'Undead' or 'Construct' or 'Elemental'
    age (int): The age of the beast.
    race (str): The race of the beast.
    gender (str): The gender of the beast.
    description (str): The description of the beast.



Tool: add_location
  Description: Adds a location to the game world knowledge graph. Returns the entity id of the location added.
  Arguments:
    location (Location): The location to add.

Model: Location
  Description: Represents a Location.
  Fields:
    entity_type (enum)
 Can be one of the following values: 'Character' or 'Beast' or 'Location' or 'Item' or 'Quest' or 'Event' or 'Faction'
    name (str): The name of the location.
    location_type (enum): The type of the location. Can be one of the following values: 'Plane' or 'City' or 'City-District' or 'Town' or 'Village' or 'Dungeon' or 'Wilderness' or 'Temple' or 'Castle' or 'Tavern' or 'Inn' or 'Shop' or 'House'
    description (str): The description of the location.



Tool: add_item
  Description: Adds an item to the game world knowledge graph. Returns the entity id of the item added.
  Arguments:
    item (Item): The item to add.

Model: Item
  Description: Represents an Item.
  Fields:
    entity_type (enum)
 Can be one of the following values: 'Character' or 'Beast' or 'Location' or 'Item' or 'Quest' or 'Event' or 'Faction'
    name (str): The name of the item.
    item_type (enum): The type of item. Can be one of the following values: 'Weapon' or 'Armor' or 'Potion' or 'Equipment' or 'Scroll' or 'Wand' or 'Ring' or 'Artifact' or 'Miscellaneous'
    description (str): The description of the item.



Tool: add_quest
  Description: Adds a quest to the game world knowledge graph. Returns the entity id of the quest added.
  Arguments:
    quest (Quest): The quest to add.

Model: Quest
  Description: Represents a Quest.
  Fields:
    entity_type (enum)
 Can be one of the following values: 'Character' or 'Beast' or 'Location' or 'Item' or 'Quest' or 'Event' or 'Faction'
    name (str): The name of the quest.
    quest_type (enum): The type of quest. Can be one of the following values: 'Find Character' or 'Find Item' or 'Kill Monster' or 'Kill Character' or 'Escort' or 'Explore' or 'Rescue' or 'Deliver'
    description (str): The description of the quest.



Tool: add_event
  Description: Adds an event to the game world knowledge graph. Returns the entity id of the event added.
  Arguments:
    event (Event): The event to add.

Model: Event
  Description: Represents an Event.
  Fields:
    entity_type (enum)
 Can be one of the following values: 'Character' or 'Beast' or 'Location' or 'Item' or 'Quest' or 'Event' or 'Faction'
    name (str): The name of the event.
    event_type (enum): The type of event. Can be one of the following values: 'History' or 'Lore' or 'Festival' or 'Murder' or 'Battle' or 'Natural Disaster' or 'Ritual'
    description (str): The description of the event.



Tool: add_faction
  Description: Adds a faction to the game world knowledge graph. Returns the entity id of the faction added.
  Arguments:
    faction (Faction): The faction to add.

Model: Faction
  Description: Represents a Faction.
  Fields:
    entity_type (enum)
 Can be one of the following values: 'Character' or 'Beast' or 'Location' or 'Item' or 'Quest' or 'Event' or 'Faction'
    name (str): The name of the faction.
    faction_type (enum): The type of faction. Can be one of the following values: 'Corporation' or 'Guild' or 'Group' or 'Government' or 'Cult' or 'Tribe'
    description (str): The description of the faction.



Tool: add_relationship
  Description: Adds a relationship between two entities to the game world knowledge graph.
  Arguments:
    relationship (Relationship): The relationship to add.

Model: Relationship
  Description: Represents a Relationship.
  Fields:
    first_entity_id (str): The entity id of the first entity.
    relationship_type (enum): The type of relationship. Can be one of the following values: 'Ally' or 'Enemy' or 'Friend' or 'Family' or 'Mentor' or 'Student' or 'Rival' or 'Lover' or 'Spouse' or 'Resides In' or 'Rules' or 'Owns' or 'Guards' or 'Located In' or 'Possesses' or 'Created' or 'Seeks' or 'Assigned By' or 'Involves' or 'Rewards' or 'Participated In' or 'Caused' or 'Affected By' or 'Member Of' or 'Allied With' or 'At War With' or 'Trading Partner' or 'Tamed By' or 'Hunts' or 'Inhabits' or 'Knows About' or 'Interacts With' or 'Protects' or 'Threatens' or 'Worships'
    second_entity_id (str): The entity id of the second entity.
    description (str): The description of the relationship.



Tool: query_characters
  Description: Queries the characters stored in the game world knowledge graph.
  Arguments:
    character_type ('Non-Player-Character' or 'Player-Character' or 'Deity' or 'Historical-Figure' or null): The type of character to query.
    name (str or null): The name of the character to query. Allows partial matches.
    age (int or null): The age of the character to query.
    race (str or null): The race of the character to query. Allows partial matches.
    gender (str or null): The gender of the character to query. Allows partial matches.
    location (str or null): The location of the character to query. Allows partial matches.



Tool: query_beasts
  Description: Queries the beasts stored in the game world knowledge graph.
  Arguments:
    beast_type ('Animal' or 'Monster' or 'Non-Monster' or 'Mythical' or 'Undead' or 'Construct' or 'Elemental' or null): The type of beast to query.
    name (str or null): The name of the beast to query. Allows partial matches.
    age (int or null): The age of the beast to query.
    race (str or null): The race of the beast to query. Allows partial matches.
    gender (str or null): The gender of the beast to query. Allows partial matches.
    location (str or null): The location of the beast to query. Allows partial matches.



Tool: query_locations
  Description: Queries the locations stored in the game world knowledge graph.
  Arguments:
    location_type ('Plane' or 'City' or 'City-District' or 'Town' or 'Village' or 'Dungeon' or 'Wilderness' or 'Temple' or 'Castle' or 'Tavern' or 'Inn' or 'Shop' or 'House' or null): The type of location to query.
    name (str or null): The name of the location to query. Allows partial matches.



Tool: query_items
  Description: Queries the items stored in the game world knowledge graph.
  Arguments:
    item_type ('Weapon' or 'Armor' or 'Potion' or 'Equipment' or 'Scroll' or 'Wand' or 'Ring' or 'Artifact' or 'Miscellaneous' or null): The type of item to query.
    name (str or null): The name of the item to query. Allows partial matches.
    location (str or null): The location of the item to query. Allows partial matches.



Tool: query_quests
  Description: Queries the quests stored in the game world knowledge graph.
  Arguments:
    quest_type ('Find Character' or 'Find Item' or 'Kill Monster' or 'Kill Character' or 'Escort' or 'Explore' or 'Rescue' or 'Deliver' or null): The type of quest to query.
    name (str or null): The name of the quest to query. Allows partial matches.
    location (str or null): The location of the quest to query. Allows partial matches.



Tool: query_events
  Description: Queries the events stored in the game world knowledge graph.
  Arguments:
    event_type ('History' or 'Lore' or 'Festival' or 'Murder' or 'Battle' or 'Natural Disaster' or 'Ritual' or null): The type of event to query.
    name (str or null): The name of the event to query. Allows partial matches.
    location (str or null): The location of the event to query. Allows partial matches.



Tool: query_factions
  Description: Queries the factions stored in the game world knowledge graph.
  Arguments:
    faction_type ('Corporation' or 'Guild' or 'Group' or 'Government' or 'Cult' or 'Tribe' or null): The type of faction to query.
    name (str or null): The name of the faction to query. Allows partial matches.
    location (str or null): The location of the faction to query. Allows partial matches.



Tool: query_relationships
  Description: Queries the relationships of a specific entity.
  Arguments:
    entity_id (str): The ID of the entity to query relationships for.
    relationship_type ('Ally' or 'Enemy' or 'Friend' or 'Family' or 'Mentor' or 'Student' or 'Rival' or 'Lover' or 'Spouse' or 'Resides In' or 'Rules' or 'Owns' or 'Guards' or 'Located In' or 'Possesses' or 'Created' or 'Seeks' or 'Assigned By' or 'Involves' or 'Rewards' or 'Participated In' or 'Caused' or 'Affected By' or 'Member Of' or 'Allied With' or 'At War With' or 'Trading Partner' or 'Tamed By' or 'Hunts' or 'Inhabits' or 'Knows About' or 'Interacts With' or 'Protects' or 'Threatens' or 'Worships' or null): The type of relationship to filter by.



Tool: query_entities_by_attribute
  Description: Queries entities based on a specific attribute value.
  Arguments:
    attribute_name (str): The name of the attribute to query.
    attribute_value (str): The value of the attribute to match.



Tool: get_entity_details
  Description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific entity.
  Arguments:
    entity_id (str): The ID of the entity to retrieve details for.



Tool: get_nearby_entities
  Description: Finds entities that are near a specified location in the knowledge graph.
  Arguments:
    location_id (str): The ID of the location to search from.
    entity_type ('Character' or 'Beast' or 'Location' or 'Item' or 'Quest' or 'Event' or 'Faction' or null): The type of entity to filter by.
    max_distance (int): The maximum distance (in graph edges) to search.



Tool: send_message
  Description: Sends a message to the user.
  Arguments:
    content (str): Content of the message to be sent.



Always remember to wait for you tool call responses after creating entities before adding relationships with them. You need the entity ids that are part of the tool call responses to add relationships!!!!
Generate a detailed game world with many entities and relationships, based on the Sword Coast and Waterdeep!

[ {"function": "add_location", "arguments": {"location": {"entity_type": "Location", "name": "Sword Coast", "location_type": "Plane", "description": "A vast region of Faerûn known for its towering mountains, dense forests, and dangerous monsters."}}}, {"function": "add_location", "arguments": {"location": {"entity_type": "Location", "name": "Waterdeep", "location_type": "City", "description": "The City of Splendors, a bustling metropolis on the Sword Coast known for its wealth, intrigue, and adventure."}}}, {"function": "add_location", "arguments": {"location": {"entity_type": "Location", "name": "Neverwinter", "location_type": "City", "description": "A coastal city to the north of Waterdeep, rebuilt after a catastrophic volcanic eruption."}}}, {"function": "add_location", "arguments": {"location": {"entity_type": "Location", "name": "Baldur's Gate", "location_type": "City", "description": "A major trading hub and military stronghold on the Sword Coast, known for its diverse population and political intrigue."}}}, {"function": "add_location", "arguments": {"location": {"entity_type": "Location", "name": "Candlekeep", "location_type": "Temple", "description": "A fortress-monastery dedicated to the preservation of knowledge and the protection of the Sword Coast from threats."}}}, {"function": "add_location", "arguments": {"location": {"entity_type": "Location", "name": "Dungeon of the Mad Mage", "location_type": "Dungeon", "description": "A treacherous dungeon complex beneath the streets of Waterdeep, filled with deadly traps and mad mages."}}}, {"function": "add_location", "arguments": {"location": {"entity_type": "Location", "name": "Highmoon", "location_type": "Town", "description": "A small town nestled in the High Forest, known for its logging industry and as a gateway to the wilderness."}}}, {"function": "add_location", "arguments": {"location": {"entity_type": "Location", "name": "Luruar", "location_type": "Village", "description": "A small village on the Sword Coast, known for its fishing industry and as a stopover for adventurers."}}}, {"function": "add_location", "arguments": {"location": {"entity_type": "Location", "name": "Misty Forest", "location_type": "Wilderness", "description": "A dense, mystical forest filled with ancient ruins, magical creatures, and hidden dangers."}}}, {"function": "add_location", "arguments": {"location": {"entity_type": "Location", "name": "Tomb of the Nine Gods", "location_type": "Dungeon", "description": "An ancient, labyrinthine dungeon dedicated to the worship of the nine gods of Faerûn."}}}, {"function": "add_location", "arguments": {"location": {"entity_type": "Location", "name": "Underdark", "location_type": "Plane", "description": "A vast subterranean world filled with dark elves, dangerous monsters, and precious metals."}}}, {"function": "add_character", "arguments": {"character": {"entity_type": "Character", "name": "Lords' Alliance", "character_type": "Non-Player-Character", "age": 0, "race": "Human", "gender": "Organization", "description": "A powerful organization dedicated to maintaining order and protecting the people of Faerûn."}}}, {"function": "add_character", "arguments": {"character": {"entity_type": "Character", "name": "Harper's", "character_type": "Non-Player-Character", "age": 0, "race": "Human", "gender": "Organization", "description": "A secretive organization dedicated to preserving the balance of power in Faerûn and preventing the return of ancient evils."}}}, {"function": "add_character", "arguments": {"character": {"entity_type": "Character", "name": "Zhentarim", "character_type": "Non-Player-Character", "age": 0, "race": "Human", "gender": "Organization", "description": "A ruthless organization dedicated to the acquisition of power and wealth at any cost."}}}, {"function": "add_character", "arguments": {"character": {"entity_type": "Character", "name": "Red Wizards of Thay", "character_type": "Non-Player-Character", "age": 0, "race": "Human", "gender": "Organization", "description": "A powerful and enigmatic organization of spellcasters dedicated to the study and mastery of magic."}}}, {"function": "add_character", "arguments": {"character": {"entity_type": "Character", "name": "Mirt the Moneylender", "character_type": "Non-Player-Character", "age": 105, "race": "Human", "gender": "Male", "description": "A wealthy and influential businessman in Waterdeep known for his loansharking and information brokerage."}}}, {"function": "add_character", "arguments": {"character": {"entity_type": "Character", "name": "Durnan", "character_type": "Non-Player-Character", "age": 45, "race": "Human", "gender": "Male", "description": "The owner and bartender of the Yawning Portal in Waterdeep, a popular tavern among adventurers."}}}, {"function": "add_character", "arguments": {"character": {"entity_type": "Character", "name": "Laeral Silverhand", "character_type": "Non-Player-Character", "age": 120, "race": "Human", "gender": "Female", "description": "A powerful sorceress and the Open Lord of Waterdeep, the highest authority in the city."}}}, {"function": "add_character", "arguments": {"character": {"entity_type": "Character", "name": "Vajra Safahr", "character_type": "Non-Player-Character", "age": 35, "race": "Half-Elf", "gender": "Female", "description": "A renowned adventurer and member of the Lords' Alliance, known for her skill in combat and leadership."}}}, {"function": "add_character", "arguments": {"character": {"entity_type": "Character", "name": "Khelben 'Blackstaff' Arunsun", "character_type": "Non-Player-Character", "age": 150, "race": "Human", "gender": "Male", "description": "A legendary archmage and the founder of the School of Spellcraft and Spellcery in Waterdeep."}}}, {"function": "add_character", "arguments": {"character": {"entity_type": "Character", "name": "Minsc", "character_type": "Player-Character", "age": 35, "race": "Human", "gender": "Male", "description": "A eccentric and powerful ranger from Baldur's Gate, accompanied by his talking giant space hamster, Boo."}}}, {"function": "add_character", "arguments": {"character": {"entity_type": "Character", "name": "Jarlaxle Baenre", "character_type": "Non-Player-Character", "age": 250, "race": "Drow", "gender": "Male", "description": "A cunning and charismatic drow mercenary captain from the Underdark, known for his sharp wit and business acumen."}}}, {"function": "add_character", "arguments": {"character": {"entity_type": "Character", "name": "Gromph Baenre", "character_type": "Non-Player-Character", "age": 350, "race": "Drow", "gender": "Male", "description": "The Archmage of Menzoberranzan, a powerful and ruthless spellcaster from the Underdark."}}}, {"function": "add_beast", "arguments": {"beast": {"entity_type": "Beast", "name": "Mind Flayer", "beast_type": "Monster", "age": 0, "race": "Illithid", "gender": "Unknown", "description": "A horrifying creature with a tentacle-covered body and a floating brain, capable of controlling the minds of other creatures."}}}, {"function": "add_beast", "arguments": {"beast": {"entity_type": "Beast", "name": "Behir", "beast_type": "Monster", "age": 0, "race": "Draconic", "gender": "Unknown", "description": "A massive, serpentine creature with the head of a dragon and the body of a snake, capable of breathing fire and constricting its prey."}}}, {"function": "add_beast", "arguments": {"beast": {"entity_type": "Beast", "name": "Displacer Beast", "beast_type": "Monster", "age": 0, "race": "Fey", "gender": "Unknown", "description": "A elusive and deadly predator with the ability to shift its position in space, making it difficult to track or attack."}}}, {"function": "add_beast", "arguments": {"beast": {"entity_type": "Beast", "name": "Frost Giant", "beast_type": "Monster", "age": 0, "race": "Giant", "gender": "Unknown", "description": "A towering giant covered in ice and capable of hurling massive boulders at its enemies."}}}, {"function": "add_beast", "arguments": {"beast": {"entity_type": "Beast", "name": "Goblin", "beast_type": "Monster", "age": 0, "race": "Goblinoid", "gender": "Unknown", "description": "A small, humanoid creature known for its cunning and cowardice, often found in large tribes."}}}, {"function": "add_beast", "arguments": {"beast": {"entity_type": "Beast", "name": "Hobgoblin", "beast_type": "Monster", "age": 0, "race": "Goblinoid", "gender": "Unknown", "description": "A larger and more disciplined cousin of the goblin, often found serving as soldiers in goblin tribes."}}}, {"function": "add_beast", "arguments": {"beast": {"entity_type": "Beast", "name": "Ogre", "beast_type": "Monster", "age": 0, "race": "Giant", "gender": "Unknown", "description": "A massive, brutish creature known for its incredible strength and appetite for human flesh."}}}, {"function": "add_beast", "arguments": {"beast": {"entity_type": "Beast", "name": "Troll", "beast_type": "Monster", "age": 0, "race": "Giant", "gender": "Unknown", "description": "A regenerative creature known for its ability to heal from almost any wound and its appetite for flesh."}}}, {"function": "add_beast", "arguments": {"beast": {"entity_type": "Beast", "name": "Yuan-ti Pureblood", "beast_type": "Monster", "age": 0, "race": "Reptilian", "gender": "Unknown", "description": "A humanoid snake capable of shapeshifting and casting spells."}}}, {"function": "add_beast", "arguments": {"beast": {"entity_type": "Beast", "name": "Zorbo", "beast_type": "Monster", "age": 0, "race": "Construct", "gender": "Unknown", "description": "A sentient, magical construct in the shape of a large, muscular man with a vorpal sword."}}}, {"function": "add_item", "arguments": {"item": {"entity_type": "Item", "name": "Staff of the Magi", "item_type": "Wand", "description": "A powerful magical staff capable of casting a wide variety of spells, often sought after by spellcasters."}}}, {"function": "add_item", "arguments": {"item": {"entity_type": "Item", "name": "Vorpal Sword", "item_type": "Weapon", "description": "A legendary sword capable of instantly killing any living creature it strikes, said to be wielded by Zorbo."}}}, {"function": "add_item", "arguments": {"item": {"entity_type": "Item", "name": "Potion of Heroism", "item_type": "Potion", "description": "A powerful potion that grants the drinker temporary immunity to fear and increased abilities in combat."}}}, {"function": "add_item", "arguments": {"item": {"entity_type": "Item", "name": "Wand of Orcus", "item_type": "Wand", "description": "A legendary wand said to be capable of destroying entire cities with a single blast, rumored to be in the possession of the Red Wizards of Thay."}}}, {"function": "add_item", "arguments": {"item": {"entity_type": "Item", "name": "Cloak of Protection", "item_type": "Armor", "description": "A magical cloak that grants the wearer resistance to certain types of damage and protection from detection spells."}}}, {"function": "add_item", "arguments": {"item": {"entity_type": "Item", "name": "Gauntlets of Ogre Power", "item_type": "Armor", "description": "A pair of magical gauntlets that grant the wearer incredible strength and the ability to smash through obstacles."}}}, {"function": "add_quest", "arguments": {"quest": {"entity_type": "Quest", "name": "The Sun's Demise", "quest_type": "Explore", "description": "A quest to explore the depths of the Underdark and prevent the return of an ancient evil."}}}, {"function": "add_quest", "arguments": {"quest": {"entity_type": "Quest", "name": "The Lost Sword of Casavir", "quest_type": "Find Item", "description": "A quest to find the legendary sword of Casavir, said to be capable of cutting through anything."}}}, {"function": "add_quest", "arguments": {"quest": {"entity_type": "Quest", "name": "The Rescue of the Sun's Demise", "quest_type": "Rescue", "description": "A quest to rescue the adventurers sent on The Sun's Demise, who have gone missing in the Underdark."}}}, {"function": "add_quest", "arguments": {"quest": {"entity_type": "Quest", "name": "The Hunt for the Black Spider", "quest_type": "Kill Character", "description": "A quest to hunt down and eliminate a notorious criminal known as the Black Spider, who has been terrorizing the streets of Waterdeep."}}}, {"function": "add_event", "arguments": {"event": {"entity_type": "Event", "name": "The Time of Troubles", "event_type": "History", "description": "A catastrophic event in which the gods of Faerûn were forced to walk among the mortals, leading to widespread chaos and destruction."}}}, {"function": "add_event", "arguments": {"event": {"entity_type": "Event", "name": "The Spellplague", "event_type": "History", "description": "A mysterious magical catastrophe that swept through Faerûn, mutating creatures and causing widespread magical chaos."}}}, {"function": "add_event", "arguments": {"event": {"entity_type": "Event", "name": "The Great Upheaval", "event_type": "History", "description": "A series of cataclysmic events that reshaped the geography and politics of Faerûn, leading to the rise of new nations and the fall of old ones."}}}, {"function": "add_event", "arguments": {"event": {"entity_type": "Event", "name": "The Second Sundering", "event_type": "History", "description": "A event in which the gods of Faerûn were forced to retreat from the world, leaving a power vacuum that was filled by mortal heroes and villains."}}}, {"function": "add_event", "arguments": {"event": {"entity_type": "Event", "name": "The Day of Rest", "event_type": "Festival", "description": "An annual festival in Waterdeep celebrating the founding of the city, featuring parades, feasts, and other festivities."}}}, {"function": "add_event", "arguments": {"event": {"entity_type": "Event", "name": "The Feast of the Moon", "event_type": "Festival", "description": "An annual festival in Waterdeep celebrating the harvest season, featuring feasts, games, and other festivities."}}}, {"function": "add_event", "arguments": {"event": {"entity_type": "Event", "name": "The Long Night", "event_type": "Festival", "description": "An annual festival in Waterdeep celebrating the winter solstice, featuring feasts, games, and other festivities."}}}, {"function": "add_event", "arguments": {"event": {"entity_type": "Event", "name": "The Murder of Candlekeep's Librarians", "event_type": "Murder", "description": "A notorious murder in which the librarians of Candlekeep were systematically killed, leading to a lengthy investigation and eventual resolution."}}}, {"function": "add_event", "arguments": {"event": {"entity_type": "Event", "name": "The Battle of Baldur's Gate", "event_type": "Battle", "description": "A major battle between the forces of Baldur's Gate and those of the surrounding nations, resulting in significant casualties on both sides."}}}, {"function": "add_event", "arguments": {"event": {"entity_type": "Event", "name": "The Cataclysm", "event_type": "Natural Disaster", "description": "A catastrophic natural disaster that devastated the Sword Coast and led to widespread destruction and loss of life."}}}, {"function": "add_event", "arguments": {"event": {"entity_type": "Event", "name": "The Ritual of the Night", "event_type": "Ritual", "description": "A secretive ritual performed by a cult in Waterdeep, rumored to grant its participants dark powers at the cost of their humanity."}}}, {"function": "add_faction", "arguments": {"faction": {"entity_type": "F
